title: "EY58 Data Analysis"
author: "Emily Yang"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
library(reshape2)
library(gridExtra)
library(ggplot2)

g <- read_excel("~/Documents/Experiments/EY58 Liq Nanoluc.xlsx", 
    sheet = "OD")
h <- read_excel("~/Documents/Experiments/EY58 Liq Nanoluc.xlsx", 
    sheet = "Lum")
```


```{r}
p <- ggplot(h, aes(x=Hours)) + 
  geom_point(aes(y = A1), color="steelblue") + 
  geom_point(aes(y = A2), color="steelblue") + 
  geom_point(aes(y = B1), color="steelblue") +
  geom_point(aes(y = B2), color="steelblue") + 
  geom_point(aes(y = C3), color="orange") + 
  geom_point(aes(y = C4), color="orange") + 
  geom_point(aes(y = D3), color="orange") +
  geom_point(aes(y = D4), color="orange") + 
  geom_point(aes(y = E1), color="pink") + 
  geom_point(aes(y = E2), color="pink") + 
  geom_point(aes(y = F1), color="pink") +
  geom_point(aes(y = F2), color="pink") 

p<- p +labs(title=" Nanoluc OD 1 ",
        x ="Time (hours)", y = "Luminescence (AU)")
p

 
p1 <- ggplot(h, aes(x=Hours)) + 
  geom_point(aes(y = A5), color="steelblue") + 
  geom_point(aes(y = A6), color="steelblue") + 
  geom_point(aes(y = B5), color="steelblue") +
  geom_point(aes(y = B6), color="steelblue") +
  geom_point(aes(y = C7), color="orange") + 
  geom_point(aes(y = C8), color="orange") + 
  geom_point(aes(y = D7), color="orange") +
  geom_point(aes(y = D8), color="orange") + 
  geom_point(aes(y = E5), color="pink") + 
  geom_point(aes(y = E6), color="pink") + 
  geom_point(aes(y = F5), color="pink") +
  geom_point(aes(y = F6), color="pink") 
p1<- p1 +labs(title=" Nanoluc OD 0.1 ",
        x ="Time (hours)", y = "Luminescence (AU)")

p1

p2 <- ggplot(h, aes(x=Hours)) + 
  geom_point(aes(y = A9), color="steelblue") + 
  geom_point(aes(y = A10), color="steelblue") + 
  geom_point(aes(y = B9), color="steelblue") +
  geom_point(aes(y = B10), color="steelblue") +
  geom_point(aes(y = C11), color="orange") + 
  geom_point(aes(y = C12), color="orange") + 
  geom_point(aes(y = D11), color="orange") +
  geom_point(aes(y = D12), color="orange") +
  geom_point(aes(y = E9), color="pink") + 
  geom_point(aes(y = E10), color="pink") + 
  geom_point(aes(y = F9), color="pink") +
  geom_point(aes(y = F10), color="pink") 

p2<- p2 +labs(title=" Nanoluc OD 0.01 ",
        x ="Time (hours)", y = "Luminescence (AU)")

p2
```
